alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:06PM PST until January 03 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches for the Columbia River Gorge, and 3 to 8 inches for the Upper Hood River Valley. * WHERE...In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will turn to rain later Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
